participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Driven and ambitious, yet feels unsupported in her pursuits. She has a taste for luxury and enjoys shopping as a form of self-expression.
participant_1.background: my family doesn't support my career choices. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i like shopping. i often shop for shoes and watches. i currently work for a watch dealer.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and easygoing, enjoys the simple pleasures of life. Values stability and has a soft spot for animals.
participant_2.background: i have never been out of ohio. i work for our local supermarket. my favorite band is the who. i've a cat named spook. my favorite food is pizza with black olives.
